LanguageData.Apparel_CentaurPants.label: centaur pants
LanguageData.Apparel_CentaurPants.description: A pair of pants suited for an equine body. Now we know how a horse would wear pants.
LanguageData.Apparel_CentaurBasicShirt.label: centaur T-shirt
LanguageData.Apparel_CentaurBasicShirt.description: A modified T-shirt for use by centaurs.
LanguageData.Apparel_CentaurCollarShirt.label: button-down centaur shirt
LanguageData.Apparel_CentaurCollarShirt.description: Designed for centaurs, this collared shirt comes with skirting and tiedowns to suit.
LanguageData.Apparel_CentaurFlakVest.label: centaur flak vest
LanguageData.Apparel_CentaurFlakVest.description: Flak armor modified for a centaur wearer. Additional weight and materials are required when compared to humanoid vests, allowing for protection of the flanks. This armor design does not protect the limbs.
LanguageData.Apparel_CentaurFlakPants.label: centaur flak pants
LanguageData.Apparel_CentaurFlakPants.description: Modified pants suited to a centaur. The addition of armored plating grants effective protection from attacks without restricting movements.
LanguageData.Apparel_CentaurFlakJacket.label: centaur flak jacket
LanguageData.Apparel_CentaurFlakJacket.description: An armoured overcoat suited for a centaur. A step below plate armor, the defense offered is by no means insignificant and still doesn't impede movement.
